name: io.bytes.per.checksum
description:
The number of bytes per checksum.  Must not be larger than
  io.file.buffer.size.

name: hadoop.http.authentication.token.validity
description:
Indicates how long (in seconds) an authentication token is valid before it has
    to be renewed.

name: ha.failover-controller.active-standby-elector.zk.op.retries
description: The number of zookeeper operation retry times in ActiveStandbyElector

name: dfs.client.datanode-restart.timeout
description:
Expert only. The time to wait, in seconds, from reception of an
    datanode shutdown notification for quick restart, until declaring
    the datanode dead and invoking the normal recovery mechanisms.
    The notification is sent by a datanode when it is being shutdown
    using the shutdownDatanode admin command with the upgrade option.
    Support multiple time unit suffix(case insensitive), as described
    in dfs.heartbeat.interval.If no time unit is specified then seconds
    is assumed.

name: dfs.namenode.fs-limits.max-xattrs-per-inode
description: Maximum number of extended attributes per inode.

name: dfs.datanode.max.nodes.to.report
description:
Number of nodes to include in JSON report. We will return nodes with
    the highest number of votes from peers.

name: dfs.client.deadnode.detection.probe.connection.timeout.ms
description: Connection timeout for probing dead node in milliseconds.

name: dfs.qjournal.queued-edits.limit.mb
description: Queue size in MB for quorum journal edits.
